ygData.subject: Re: Level progression
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Steve, ... I m in about the same boat as you.  I don t get to play as often as I d like and I enjoy experimenting with different race/class combos just to
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Steve,

> How are you all finding progression? I'm in no
> great hurry, and I'm
> certainly not a power player, but I get the feeling
> that some class/race
> combos have a much easier time of it than others,
> perhaps too much for
> balance.

I'm in about the same boat as you. I don't get to play as often as I'd
like and I enjoy experimenting with different race/class combos just to
see if I'm missing something. My two favorite characters (and most
often played) are a Dark Elf Warrior and Half-Elf Bard. I give them
about equal time and my warrior is 5th level and my bard 3rd. I've
surfed a good bit to find stats about a variety of topics, but I don't
think I've found a good source to compare experience levels (or if I
have, I've forgotten).

> I know the hybrid classes have to earn more
> experience, but does anyone know
> any details?
>
> Steve

If I find some good stats, I'll post them and if anyone has some stats
or a link, I would be interested to know as well.

Catch you on-line,

Drew
